item.title: Set up Raspberry Pi 4(Wi-Fi)
item.description: The set up for Raspberry Pi using Wi-Fi is the same as the previous article on how to Set Up Raspberry Pi 4 through laptop/pc using Ethernet cable(No Moniter, No Wi-Fi) with some minor changes which we are going to see. Hardware Requirements: Raspberry Pi 4 Model B (1/2/4 GB RAM) USB Type-C power supply Personal computer Steps to install the required software tools If you had followed the previous article then skip these steps and move to ‘step-6’.
